Literature.Title: The Dolphin Proline-Rich Antimicrobial Peptide Tur1A Inhibits Protein Synthesis by Targeting the Bacterial Ribosome.
Literature.Author: Mardirossian M, Pérébaskine N, Benincasa M, Gambato S, Hofmann S, Huter P, Müller CW, Hilpert K, Innis CA, Tossi A, Wilson DN

Literature.Title: Characterization of Cetacean Proline-Rich Antimicrobial Peptides Displaying Activity against ESKAPE Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Sola R, Mardirossian M, Beckert B, Sanghez De Luna L, Prickett D, Tossi A, Wilson DN, Scocchi M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=32 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:20% Killing=32 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=1.2±0.4µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-sbmA(MIC=2.3±1.3µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-yjiL(MIC=1.9±1.1µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-sbmA/del-yjiL(MIC=6.4±2.2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.5µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=0.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Pantoea agglomerans(MIC=1µM),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia ATCC 13637(MIC=1µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90029(MIC=2µM),Human chronic B cell leukemia MEC-1(50-60% Killing=32µM)
